doc:
Robert E. Merriman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_E._Merriman 0 Robert E. Merriman (November 5, 1916 – February 2, 1983), was an actor, a Tony Award winning producer, and a director for Broadway theatre, Off Broadway and television. He was the winner of the Drama Desk Award for his performance as Quillery in Idiot's Delight. Robert_E._Merriman ( November_5_,_1916 – February_2_,_1983 ) , was an_actor , a_Tony_Award_winning_producer , and a_director for Broadway_theatre , Off Broadway_and_television . He was the_winner of the_Drama_Desk_Award for his_performance as Quillery in Idiot 's_Delight .
